@kpayson64  when changing  scenario_result_schema.json, the actual biquery schema also needs to be updated, otherwise the qps benchmarks won't be able to upload.

```
+ tools/run_tests/performance/bq_upload_result.py --bq_result_table=performance_test.performance_experiment_32core
Warning: Table performance_experiment_32core already exists
Error inserting rows! Response: {u'kind': u'bigquery#tableDataInsertAllResponse', u'insertErrors': [{u'index': 0, u'errors': [{u'debugInfo': u'', u'reason': u'invalid', u'message': u'no such field.', u'location': u'serverstats[0].core_pollset_fd_cache_hits'}]}]}
Error uploading result to bigquery.
```

I've ran this to fix the uploading issue:
```
tools/run_tests/performance/patch_scenario_results_schema.py --bq_result_table performance_test.performance_experiment
tools/run_tests/performance/patch_scenario_results_schema.py --bq_result_table performance_test.performance_experiment_32core
tools/run_tests/performance/patch_scenario_results_schema.py --bq_result_table performance_test.performance_experiment_windows
tools/run_tests/performance/patch_scenario_results_schema.py --bq_result_table performance_released.performance_experiment
tools/run_tests/performance/patch_scenario_results_schema.py --bq_result_table performance_released.performance_experiment_32core
tools/run_tests/performance/patch_scenario_results_schema.py --bq_result_table performance_released.performance_experiment_windows
```
@jtattermusch That was my fault. I told Ken I'd update the schema and missed a few tables. Thanks for fixing this.
